groups.label: Correlation
groups.tooltip: Learn more about message correlation in the documentation.

groups.label: Deduplication
groups.tooltip: Deduplication allows you to configure multiple inbound connector elements to reuse the same backend (consumer/thread/endpoint) by sharing the same deduplication ID.

properties.label: Webhook method
properties.description: Select HTTP method

properties.label: Webhook ID
properties.description: The webhook ID is a part of the URL

pattern.message: can only contain letters, numbers, or single underscores/hyphens and cannot begin or end with an underscore/hyphen

properties.label: HMAC authentication
properties.description: Choose whether HMAC verification is enabled. See documentation and example that explains how to use HMAC-related fields

properties.label: HMAC secret key
properties.description: Shared secret key

properties.label: HMAC header
properties.description: Name of header attribute that will contain the HMAC value

properties.label: HMAC algorithm
properties.description: Choose HMAC algorithm

properties.label: HMAC scopes
properties.description: Set HMAC scopes for calculating signature data. See documentation

properties.label: Authorization type
properties.description: Choose the authorization type

properties.label: Username
properties.description: Username for basic authentication

properties.label: Password
properties.description: Password for basic authentication

properties.label: API key
properties.description: Expected API key

properties.label: API key locator
properties.description: A FEEL expression that extracts API key from the request. See documentation

properties.label: JWK URL
properties.description: Well-known URL of JWKs

properties.label: JWT role property expression
properties.description: Expression to extract the roles from the JWT token. See documentation

properties.label: Required roles
properties.description: List of roles to test JWT roles against

properties.label: Response expression
properties.description: Expression used to generate the HTTP response

properties.label: One time verification response expression
properties.description: Specify condition and response. Learn more in the documentation

properties.label: Activation condition
properties.description: Condition under which the Connector triggers. Leave empty to catch all events

properties.label: Consume unmatched events
properties.tooltip: Unmatched events are rejected by default, allowing the upstream service to handle the error. Check this box to consume unmatched events and return a success response

properties.label: Correlation key (process)
properties.description: Sets up the correlation key from process variables

properties.label: Correlation key (payload)
properties.description: Extracts the correlation key from the incoming message payload

properties.label: Message ID expression
properties.description: Expression to extract unique identifier of a message

properties.label: Message TTL
properties.description: Time-to-live for the message in the broker (ISO-8601 duration)

properties.label: Manual mode
properties.description: By default, similar connectors receive the same deduplication ID. Customize by activating manual mode

pattern.message: can only contain alphanumeric characters, dashes, and underscores

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables
